roleData.title: Data Scientist Intern
roleData.description: Developed a credit risk prediction system utilizing a 45,000-record dataset and evaluated Random Forest, XGBoost, and Linear Regression models. Achieved 15% improvement in accuracy over baseline and deployed the model via Flask API with React web interface for real-time risk prediction.

roleData.title: Software Development and IT Support Intern
roleData.description: Engineered a C# application to streamline intern management, reducing manual workload by 30% and accelerating evaluation processes by 20%. Resolved 15+ daily hardware and software issues and optimized OS installations using bootable USB drives, decreasing setup time by 25%.
